markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Incredible Familiar](/Feats.aspx?ID=5004) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Animist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=836" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=734" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 188 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Familiar Master](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=250) (Level 10), [Rivethun Emissary](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=308) (Level 8)

**Prerequisites**
[Enhanced Familiar](/Feats.aspx?ID=4717)

</column>

---

Your familiar is imbued with even more magic than other familiars. You can select a base of six familiar or master abilities each day, instead of four.

**Special** Add the bonus familiar abilities you gain for being a witch to this amount.
name: Incredible Familiar
